pkgmetadata.longdescription: # digitgenA Synthetic Text Image generator for Regular Scene text Detection.## Installation### 1. From PIP$`pip install ImgAnn`### 2. From githubclone the codebase from GitHub```$ git clone https://github.com/ACRA-FL/digitgen.git```build the library```$ python setup.py bdist_wheel sdist$ pip install -e .
